duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide great customer service, take orders, assemble orders, and clean dining room.
Thrive in an upbeat and fast-paced environment, work all shifts, and communicate with customers.
Provide paid training for new Customer Service Associates and offer growth opportunities.
Earn up to an extra dollar fifty per hour in pay increases through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations.
Demonstrate the qualities of a team player, excellent communicator, hardworking and attentive, responsible and dependable, authentic, genuine, and takes pride in doing a good job.
Clean tables, floors, take orders, process payments efficiently, and follow safety procedures when handling food.
Lift and carry heavy objects, kneel, bend, twist, ascend or descend stairs, reach and grasp objects, and show up to scheduled shifts on time.
Work under pressure, align with company culture, take initiative, and comply with company policies.
Provide quick and friendly service to all customers, work together as a team, and balance working hard with having fun.
Connect with customers and provide general consideration for those not ready to apply.
